overview: Baywalk is one of Manila's most famous tourist attractions. Among the homeless who gather there at night is Takashi Akatsuka, a Japanese man who has become penniless after coming to the Philippines. Meanwhile, Masami Sekiya has recently moved into a high-rise apartment a few hundred meters away from Baywalk to start enjoying his life after retirement. However, no matter how much time passes, life does not seem to get any better for either of the two.
title: at Baywalk
